About This Demo

What is Fastband MCP?

Fastband MCP is a universal AI-powered development platform that provides intelligent tools, ticket management, and multi-agent coordination for software development projects.

How This Demo Uses Fastband

This Flask web application demonstrates how to structure a project that leverages Fastband MCP for:

  • Project configuration via .fastband/config.yaml
  • Development task tracking with the ticket CLI
  • AI-assisted development through the MCP server

Try It Out

Check the project's README.md for step-by-step instructions on using Fastband MCP with this web application.
